thread.title: R.Ives
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by R.Ives

author: R.Ives
title: R.Ives
text: Due to a call in the previous week the shop was short handed, I decided to reschedule the appointment to the following Saturday; they were very apologetic about the inconvenience and promptly rescheduled the appointment. The rescheduled appointment was prompt, very quick and the gentleman remembered me from the previous week and apologized again for the inconvenience. Didn't even have enough time to finish my coffee they were so quick. Was a good experience.
